snippet: The gunman, who killed three women and wounded two men Wednesday, had been placed in a psychiatric ward in 2005, when guns he then owned were destroyed.
abstract: Gunman who shot and killed three women and wounded two men in Swiss village of Daillon had previously had guns he owned taken from him and destroyed when he was played in psychiatric ward in 2005; it is not known how he got new weapons, but acquiring them was probably not difficult in country where guns are easily available.
lead_paragraph: The gunman, who killed three women and wounded two men Wednesday, had been placed in a psychiatric ward in 2005, when guns he then owned were destroyed.

headline.seo: Swiss Gunman Was Known to Authorities
headline.main: Swiss Gunman Had Weapons Taken Away Previously
headline.print_headline: Swiss Gunman Who Killed 3 Was Known to Authorities
